site.embed_html: <iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="facebook" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" style="height:360px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/facebook.min.html#{{ $id ? $type . $id : 'pfbid' . $pfbid }}"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="gist" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/gist.min.html#{$id}" style="height:180px;width:100%" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="googleplus" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" style="height:240px;width:450px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/googleplus.min.html#{{ $oid ? $oid : '+' . $name }}/posts/{$pid}"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="imgur" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>{let s=this.style,d=e.data.split(' ');s.height=d[0]+'px';s.width=d[1]+'px'};this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" style="height:400px;width:542px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/imgur.min.html#{{ $type=='album' ? 'a/' : '' }}{$id}"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="instagram" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" style="height:540px;width:540px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/instagram.min.html#{$id}{{ property('styleType')=='dark' ? '#theme=dark' : '' }}"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="mastodon" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/mastodon.min.html#{$name}/{$id}" style="height:300px;width:550px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="medium" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/medium.min.html#{$id}" style="height:316px;width:900px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="megaphone" allowfullscreen="" scrolling="no" style="height:200px;width:900px" src="https://player.megaphone.fm/{$id}{{ property('styleType')=='light' ? '?light=true' : '' }}"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="pinterest" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/pinterest.min.html#{$id}" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2" style="height:360px;width:{{ contains($id,'/') ? '730' : '345' }}px"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="reddit" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/reddit.min.html#{$id}{$path}#theme={{property('styleType')}}" style="height:165px;width:800px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="soundcloud" allowfullscreen="" scrolling="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url={{ $playlist_id ? 'https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/' . $playlist_id . '%3Fsecret_token%3D' . $secret_token : ($track_id ? 'https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/' . $track_id . '%3Fsecret_token%3D' . $secret_token : (!contains($id,'://') ? 'https%3A//soundcloud.com/' : '') . $id) }}" style="height:{{ ($playlist_id or contains($id,'/sets/')) ? '450' : '166' }}px;width:900px"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="sporcle" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/sporcle.min.html#{$id}" style="height:535px;width:820px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="spotify" allow="encrypted-media" allowfullscreen="" scrolling="no" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/{$id|replace(':','/')}{$path}" style="border-radius:12px;height:{{ ($id|substr(0,7) == 'episode' or $id|substr(0,4) == 'show' or $id|substr(0,5) == 'track') ? '152' : '380' }}px;width:900px"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="telegram" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" style="height:96px;width:500px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/telegram.min.html#{$id}{{ property('styleType')=='dark' ? '#theme=dark' : '' }}"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="tiktok" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/tiktok.min.html#{$id}" style="height:740px;width:325px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="tumblr" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/tumblr.min.html#{$key}/{$id}" style="height:300px;width:520px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2"></iframe>

<iframe data-s9e-mediaembed="twitter" allow="autoplay *" allowfullscreen="" onload="let c=new MessageChannel;c.port1.onmessage=e=>this.style.height=e.data+'px';this.contentWindow.postMessage('s9e:init','*',[c.port2])" scrolling="no" style="height:273px;width:550px" data-s9e-mediaembed-api="2" src="https://s9e.github.io/iframe/2/twitter.min.html#{$id}{{ property('styleType')=='dark' ? '#theme=dark' : '' }}"></iframe>
